HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free for orders over 999 Kč, or over 499 Kč for TchiboCard members.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 4 to 7 business days, for selected products 1 to 2 weeks

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Standard shipping fee of 89 Kč applies, but the site notes that in exceptional cases a higher fee may be charged.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 4 to 7 business days, for selected products 1 to 2 weeks

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Tchibo.cz provides home delivery and in-store pickup. Home delivery is handled by DPD for standard parcels and Rhenus Home Delivery for bulky items. In-store pickup is available at all Tchibo physical stores. The company does not offer delivery to third-party parcel shops or lockers. Delivery is restricted to the Czech Republic.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs 89 Kč. Shipping is free for orders over 999 Kč, or over 499 Kč for TchiboCard loyalty program members. In-store pickup is always free. Cash on delivery (COD) incurs a 29 Kč surcharge for home delivery; payment upon pickup in-store is free.
DELIVERY TIMES: The standard delivery time for both home delivery and in-store pickup is 4-7 business days, though some items may take 1-2 weeks. No express or weekend delivery options are available.
NOTABLE FEATURES: A key feature is the TchiboCard, which provides a lower free shipping threshold (499 Kč vs. 999 Kč). Bulky items like furniture are explicitly excluded from in-store pickup and must be delivered to a home address. The website allows customers to track their DPD shipments.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is consolidated on a single 'Doručení' (Delivery) page, which is clearly structured and easy to understand. It covers costs, delivery times, providers, and different methods. However, it lacks information on parcel shops/lockers and does not offer any expedited shipping services.
